HeroSection.title: Flutter widgets catalog
HeroSection.subtitle:
A comprehensive, interactive reference for Flutter widgets, with
live previews, code examples, and instant copy functionality.

WidgetProperties.title: Properties
WidgetProperties.noProperties: No properties defined for this widget.

scaffold.name: Scaffold
scaffold.description: Implements the basic Material Design visual layout structure.

appBar.name: AppBar
appBar.description: A Material Design app bar that is typically used as a child of a Scaffold.

sliverAppBar.name: SliverAppBar
sliverAppBar.description: A Material Design app bar that integrates with a CustomScrollView.

drawer.name: Drawer
drawer.description: A Material Design panel that slides in horizontally from the edge of a Scaffold.

bottomNavigationBar.name: BottomNavigationBar
bottomNavigationBar.description: A Material Design widget that shows a row of navigation items at the bottom of the screen.

materialApp.name: MaterialApp
materialApp.description: A convenience widget that wraps a number of widgets that are commonly required for Material Design applications.

container.name: Container
container.description: A convenience widget that combines common painting, positioning, and sizing widgets.

padding.name: Padding
padding.description: A widget that insets its child by the given padding.

center.name: Center
center.description: A widget that centers its child within itself.

sizedBox.name: SizedBox
sizedBox.description: A box with a specified size.

row.name: Row
row.description: A widget that displays its children in a horizontal array.

column.name: Column
column.description: A widget that displays its children in a vertical array.

stack.name: Stack
stack.description: A widget that positions its children relative to the edges of its box.

expanded.name: Expanded
expanded.description: A widget that expands a child of a Row, Column, or Flex.

filledButton.name: FilledButton
filledButton.description: A Material Design filled button, a contained button with a solid background color.

outlinedButton.name: OutlinedButton
outlinedButton.description: A Material Design button with a thin border and no fill color.

textButton.name: TextButton
textButton.description: A Material Design button that looks like a flat piece of text.

iconButton.name: IconButton
iconButton.description: A picture printed on a Material widget that reacts to touches.

floatingActionButtonFAB.name: FloatingActionButton (FAB)
floatingActionButtonFAB.description: A circular icon button that hovers over content to promote a primary, or most common, action in an application.

popupMenuButton.name: PopupMenuButton
popupMenuButton.description: Displays a menu when pressed and calls onSelected when the menu is dismissed because an item was selected.

dropdownButton.name: DropdownButton
dropdownButton.description: A button that, when pressed, displays a list of items from which to choose.

snackBar.name: SnackBar
snackBar.description: A lightweight message with an optional action which briefly displays at the bottom of the screen.

tooltip.name: Tooltip
tooltip.description: A textual label that appears when the user hovers over, focuses on, or long-presses a widget.

text.name: Text
text.description: A run of text with a single style.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: A graphical icon widget drawn from a font.

image.name: Image
image.description: A widget that displays an image.

card.name: Card
card.description: A Material Design card: a panel with slightly rounded corners and an elevation shadow.

chip.name: Chip
chip.description: A compact element that represents an input, attribute, or action.

circularProgressIndicator.name: CircularProgressIndicator
circularProgressIndicator.description: A circular progress indicator, which spins to indicate that the application is busy.

textField.name: TextField
textField.description: A text input field that allows users to enter and edit text.

textFormField.name: TextFormField
textFormField.description: A TextField that integrates with a Form.

inputDecoration.name: InputDecoration
inputDecoration.description: The visual decoration for a Material Design text field, such as labels, icons, and borders.

form.name: Form
form.description: An optional container for grouping and validating multiple form fields.

listView.name: ListView
listView.description: A scrollable list of widgets arranged linearly.

customScrollView.name: CustomScrollView
customScrollView.description: A ScrollView that creates custom scroll effects using slivers.

sliverList.name: SliverList
sliverList.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a linear array along the main axis.

sliverGrid.name: SliverGrid
sliverGrid.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a 2D arrangement.

theme.name: Theme
theme.description: Applies a theme to descendant widgets. A theme describes the colors and typographic choices for an application.

themeData.name: ThemeData
themeData.description: Defines the configuration of the overall visual Theme for a MaterialApp or a widget subtree.

mediaQuery.name: MediaQuery
mediaQuery.description: Establishes a subtree in which media queries resolve to the given data.

colorScheme.name: ColorScheme
colorScheme.description: A set of 30 colors based on the Material spec that can be used to configure the color properties of most components.

backdropFilter.name: BackdropFilter
backdropFilter.description: A widget that applies a filter to the existing painted content and then paints the child.

boxShadow.name: BoxShadow
boxShadow.description: A shadow cast by a box. The BoxShadow is not a widget but a class used in BoxDecoration.

opacity.name: Opacity
opacity.description: A widget that makes its child partially transparent.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: A widget that applies a perspective transformation to its child.
